price: 51 Gardez-vous d’associer d’autres divinités à Allah qui m’a chargé de vous avertir de façon explicite. »
arabic: وَلَا تَجۡعَلُواْ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَۖ إِنِّي لَكُم مِّنۡهُ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: walā tajʿalū maʿa al-lahi ilāhan ākhara innī lakum min'hu nadhīrun mubīnun
